title: Unexpected Gifts
description: Short Story A pity party normally doesn’t include gifts. Of course, it usually doesn’t include company…or sex, either. Feeling sorry for herself, Cassie Williams plays sick to skip out of her family’s Christmas Eve gathering. She loves her family, but on the heels of a divorce and her ex’s new engagement, an evening of togetherness is the last thing she wants. Long-time friend, Sam MacLane has been in love with Cassie for years, and he isn’t about to let her have her pity party. There’s a blizzard on the way, and Sam shows up on her doorstep—bearing gifts...
author: Bronwyn Green
